venue.name: Catbird Cafe @ Catbird Cafe of the NE Wildlife Ctr,

item.description:
This is a benefit event to collect 'wish list' items for the troops.

It will be held in the Catbird Cafe of the NE Wildlife Ctr, 500 Columbia St, Weymouth starting at 7:30pm.

There will be music (Bear Bones Band - very fun) food, raffles and lots of fun.

No admission charge except we would like a donation of something from the list below.If you can't attend but would like to donate something- please let me know.

Here is a list of items the troops are asking for:
phone cards,beef jerky,slim jims,seasoning,tobasco sauce,ranch salad dressing,velveeta cheese red.size,cookies (indv.pkgs.),chips,cheese and crackers pkgs.,sunflower seeds,bags of peanuts,gum,lifesavers,hard candy,mad flash light,bulbs and batteries,stationary,pens,insect repellant (pump action),hand warmers,sweatpants (woman) sweatpants (men),shorts (men and woman),white t-shirts,cereal (small boxes),peanut butter,jelly (squeeze bottle),thank you cards,visine,chapstick.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Benefit for Troops March 26, 7:30 pm New England Wildlife Center in Weymouth
